How to Buy Bitcoins with Cash

Why buy bitcoins with cash? It's private, usually quick, and super easy. Converting your cash to bitcoin can get you bitcoins within a couple of hours. Many of the options below do not require you to verify your identity or provide sensitive personal details. Buying bitcoins with cash is also the best way for minors and people under the age of 18 to get bitcoins.

BitQuick Buy Bitcoin

BitQuick helps you buy bitcoins fast in the United States with cash via cash deposit.

Now we're going to explain how the various methods of buying bitcoins with cash work. If you want more information about the companies listed above, click here.

Buy Bitcoins with Cash with Peer-to-Peer Exchanges

Peer-to-peer (P2P) Bitcoin exchanges are a great way to get bitcoins with cash. A P2P trade usually works something like this:

  1. A buyer and seller use a site like LocalBitcoins or BitQuick and agree on a price.
  2. The seller’s bitcoins are held by the site (in this case LocalBitcoins or BitQuick) and only released to the buyer upon confirmation of payment.
  3. The buyer deposits cash into the seller’s bank account.
  4. The seller confirms payment.
  5. The site (LocalBitcoins or BitQuick) releases the bitcoins to the buyer.
  6. The seller got cash, and the buyer got bitcoins. The trade is complete!

The above was just an example. Through sites like LocalBitcoins you can agree on other payment methods besides cash deposit. For example, you could arrange to meet in person and exchange cash for Bitcoin.

There are two main reasons that P2P exchanges offer a near instant way to buy bitcoins:

  1. No verification is required. You don’t need to submit any personal details and there is no verification process that takes up time.
  2. Cash payments are irreversible. Once cash is in someone’s bank account, the buyer of bitcoin has no way to reverse the transaction. So the seller can feel confident that he received payment for bitcoins, and release the bitcoins to the buyer.

P2P exchanges offer a fast way to buy bitcoins, but P2P exchange rates may be a bit higher than the global average Bitcoin exchange rate. People are willing to pay more to buy bitcoins both more privately and faster. The markup is usually somewhere around 5-10% on LocalBitcoins. BitQuick generally has rates close to market. Check the against a Bitcoin price index like Bitcoin Average or the CoinDesk BPI.

Buy Bitcoins with Cash from Bitcoin ATMs

Bitcoin ATMs are another great way to purchase bitcoins with cash. While you may have to physically drive or walk to the ATM, once you reach the ATM you can buy. You’ll need to be lucky enough to have a Bitcoin ATM in your area. Coin ATM Radar keeps track of Bitcoin ATMs around the world and makes it easy to locate an ATM in your area. You can do the following to check if there is a Bitcoin ATM near you:

1. Go to CoinATMRadar.com

2. Search by Location

In the search box in the top left, type in the name of your country or city and click enter.

3. Find an ATM

Once you search, you’ll be taken to the location you entered on the map. If you see map pin markers, you’re in luck! That means there are Bitcoin ATMs in your area.

4. Choose an ATM

Click on one of the map markers for more details about a specific ATM. From there, you can also click on “Read More” at the bottom for even more details.

While Bitcoin ATMs make it easy to buy bitcoin with cash, there are some downsides. Bitcoin ATMs generally sell bitcoins at a mark-up of 5-10%. Before you buy bitcoin from an ATM, check the ATM’s price against a Bitcoin price index like Bitcoin Average or the CoinDesk BPI.

Some ATMs may require verification, like a picture of an ID or a finger print scan. Coin ATM Radar provides details on each ATM so be sure to check if the Bitcoin ATM near you requires verification.

More Information about Cash Exchanges

BitQuick Buy Bitcoin

BitQuick provides escrow and connects you with sellers. You can buy bitcoin via cash deposit at a number of banks across the United States and Europe. Bitcoin purchases made with cash deposit are usually delivered within two hours, and in many cases in under an hour.

Buy Bitcoin

Local Bitcoins Buy Bitcoin

It's possible to buy bitcoins with cash on LocalBitcoins via cash trade in-person or with cash deposit. LocalBitcoins provides escrow and connects you with sellers. It's private and LocalBitcoins does not require any personal details or verification, altough specific sellers may request. Be sure to buy from sellers with previous trade history and positive feedback. Local Bitcoins charges a flat 1% fee on each purchase.

Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX Buy Bitcoin

LibertyX lets you buy bitcoin with cash at a number of retail stores across the United States. You'll have to verify your identity before buying, making LibertyX less private than some of the other options. You can buy up to $1000 worth of bitcoin and will be charged a 1% fee on all purchases. If you sign up with Facebook you can buy your first $1000 fee free. Your bitcoin should arrive a few minutes after your payment is made.

Buy Bitcoin

Coin ATM Radar Buy Bitcoin

Coin ATM Radar is a Bitcoin ATM map that helps you find a Bitcoin ATM in your local area. Using Bitcoin ATMs you can buy bitcoins with cash. The average ATM charges a fee of 5-10%, but this is what people are willing to pay to buy bitcoins privately and with no verification. There are many Bitcoin ATM manufacturates, so each ATM is different. Some require verification, some don't.

Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins Buy Bitcoin

Wall of Coins is another company that helps match buyers and sellers, with all payments done via cash deposits. You can buy up to $2000 worth of bitcoin via cash deposit at a number of banks across the United States. After your cash deposit is made you'll usually receive your coins within 15 minutes.

Buy Bitcoin

Mycelium Local Trader Buy Bitcoin

The Mycelium Bitcoin Wallet for Android offers a feature called "Local Trader". Using Local Trader, you can find sellers in your area and meet them in-person to buy bitcoins with cash.

Frequently Asked Questions

What are risks are involved buying bitcoins with cash?

Buying bitcoins with cash can be very low risk. If making a trade in-person, it's best to meet in a public place to reduce the risk of scamming or theft. If buying bitcoins with cash via cash deposit, use an escrow service to ensure the seller must send you the bitcoins after receiving bitcoins.

What are the benefits and advantages?

It's easy to buy small amounts of bitcoin with cash. It's also private, since no personal information is required in most cases, especially if trading in person or at an ATM with no verification. Buying bitcoins with cash is also fast, as there is no verification to slow down the process.

What are the disadvantages?

It can be hard to buy large amounts of bitcoins with cash, especially with cash deposit. Bitcoin ATMs also have limits and some require verification if more than a certain amount is purchased.

It's easy buy bitcoin with cash quickly and in small amounts. If you need to buy larger amounts of bitcoin then buy with ACH transfer.
